From the ME-studio
Because of its well equipped studio,
and the very good results of its re¬
cordings, M & E also has secured agre-
ments to deliver radio progams to
foreign countries. Thus our reproductions
of first-hand music of different types, is
being transmitted by several stations in
foreign countries. This work is handled
by a special department of the company
under the name of Swedish Radio & TV
program Service. The studio has also a
number of direct connections with the
Swedish Telegraph Co., which the
Swedish Broadcast Corp. can call on at
short notice.
Production of TV programs is on M & E:s working list too.
In the fourth floor of the office building a TV studio
is to be arranged. TV program will be produced for transmit¬
ters in foreign countries as well as for the Swedish transmitters.
JM & E has ordered a Video recorder from A^mpPY and this
equipment is intended to be used for demonstration purposes
and in producing taped TV programs, which can be sent to
any transmitter wanting the type of programs produced in
this studio.
PHONOTAPE
From what is said above it is clear, that M & E is
working on new and modern lines. Its activities have in
view not only the present but also the future. There are
equipments and technical employees for the different tasks.
M & E therefore wants to be a support for its resellers and
customers and also for foreign contractors wanting to introduce
their products in the electronic line on the Swedish market.
